<div>

  <h3>
    Save Document
  </h3>
  <h5>
    Ctrl + S (Windows) <br>
    Command + S (Mac)
  </h5>
  
  <h3>
    Run Line in Chunk
  </h3>
  <h5>
    Ctrl + Enter (Windows) <br>
    Command + Enter (Mac)
  </h5>
  
  <h3>
    Run Entire Code Chunk
  </h3>
  <h5>
    Ctrl + Shift + Enter (Windows) <br>
    Command + Shift + enter (Mac) 
  </h5>
  
  <h3>
    Search Help for Item (Step Into)
  </h3>
  <h5>
   F1 key <br>
   (Or fn key + F1 key if keybinds are swapped)
  
  </h5>
  
  <h3>
    Quick Insert Code Chunk in 
  </h3>
  <h5>
    Ctrl + Alt + I (Windows) <br>
    Command + Option + I (Mac)
  </h5>
  
  <h3>
    Knit Entire Document
  </h3>
  <h5>
    Ctrl + Shift + K (Windows) <br>
    Cmd + Shift + K (Mac)
  </h5>
  <br>
  <h7>
    <i>Basic Shortcuts you will use most often. More shortcuts can be viewed
    in the keyboard shortcuts menu in ```Tools -> Keyboard Shortcuts Help``` or
    press ```Alt + Shift + K (Windows) / Option + Shift + K (Mac)``` </i>

        knitr::include_graphics("../Images/KeyboardShortcuts.png")

  </h7>
